body: Check the quality of the RNA and design primers as decribed in "Protocol step A":http://www.nature.com/protocolexchange/system/uploads/2436/original/nprot.2010.28_-_protocol_step_A.pdf?1358506599

Perform RNA processing \(B), Reverse Transcription \(C) and Outer 5'RLM-RACE PCR \(D) as described in "Protocol step B":http://www.nature.com/protocolexchange/system/uploads/2437/original/nprot.2010.28_-_protocol_step_B.pdf?1358506624, "step C":http://www.nature.com/protocolexchange/system/uploads/2438/original/nprot.2010.28_-_protocol_step_C.pdf?1358506643 and "step D":http://www.nature.com/protocolexchange/system/uploads/2439/original/nprot.2010.28_-_protocol_step_D.pdf?1358506663.
Perform Nested PCR\(2+4) as described in "Protocol step E":http://www.nature.com/protocolexchange/system/uploads/2440/original/nprot.2010.28_-_protocol_step_E.pdf?1358506687
Perfom TOPO TA Cloning as described in "Protocol step F":http://www.nature.com/protocolexchange/system/uploads/2441/original/nprot.2010.28_-_protocol_step_F.pdf?1358506712
